name: Gankyu's Crypt
description:
In this Zelda-inspired dungeon crawler, you take control of Clara and navigate your way through Gankyu's Crypt. You fill face many trials on your way to free the villagers from the terror of the monsters. 

Who are we: Island Games is a two-man team of college students that work on videogames as their hobby. We've been making games for a few years now and we wanted to release a working tech demo to show everyone our progress. if you have any questions or found a bug, feel free to leave a comment.

Licenses: 

Music by: 
Benjamin Burnes (Three Red Hearts: Prepare to Dev Edition) - http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
